name: Space Adventures (itch) (ENYZDev_209)
description:
This is my very first game that is published to itch.io, it was inspired to an old video game called "Space Invaders", so if you guys tracked any bugs in the game please report it to me so that I can fix it.

Controls:

W - move upwards

S - move downwards

A - move to the left

D - move to the right 

SPACE - Shoot Laser

How to play:

  • Use the laser to kill the aliens
  • Do not let the aliens get to the bottom or it's game over

I hope you enjoy  it :)
